amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-259 to increase the House Wounded Warrior Program by $250,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Kildee.
